mapper.select: select reply_no, replyer, reply, board_no, reply_date from tb1_reply where board_no = #{bno} order by reply_no

select b.* from ( select /* INDEX (r PK_REPLY) */ rownum rn, r.* from tb1_reply r where board_no = #{boardNo}) b
where b.rn <= #{page} * 5
and b.rn > (#{page} -1) * 5
mapper.insert: insert into tb1_reply (reply_no, replyer, reply, board_no) values (#{replyNo}, #{replyer}, #{reply}, #{boardNo})
